# Draft:William Duffy (Delaware judge)

≠
William Duffy (YEAR – September 24, 1998) was a justice of the Delaware Supreme Court from 1973 to 1982.
University of Delaware
World War II
University of Pennsylvania Law School
He was ppointed by former Governor Elbert N. Carvel served from March 23, 1961. He was was appointed President Judge of the Superior Court on July 23, 1962. He served until August 3, 1966 when he began service as Chancellor of the Court of Chancery. He began service as an associate justice of the Delaware Supreme Court on August 9, 1973. He retired on January 27, 1982. Duffy died on September 24, 1998.
https://www.bayardlaw.com/history
